website_summaries.verdict: A volumizing hair spray that will last a whole day without needing to reapply.
pros: Strong hold that lasts all day
cons: Can build up in your hair if you're using it frequently

customer_reviews.title: holy grail of hairspray
customer_reviews.text: perfect hairspray. Firm hold but touchable and re-doable if you want to and doesn't make your hair feel crunchy which is a word that should never be used in relation to hair. After all these years, the only one I use.
customer_reviews.author: Barb7777

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic hold, but becomes super glue in humidity.
customer_reviews.text: Love the hold, but I have very fine and porous hair that absorbs moisture (AND HUMIDITY) easily. This becomes concrete in my hair if I'm at the beach, caught in a drizzle, or sweat. I even woke up one morning in a hotel (it didn't seem as if the room was overly humid) with my hair completely matted all over my head. Apparently the room had more humidity than I realized! If I try to comb through it, my hair will absolutely break off unless I wash it out first. All that being said, I can't find another product (spray or otherwise) that holds my hair in place as well as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Been looking for this product all my life
customer_reviews.text: I found this stuff to my hair stylist salon and it was the only hairspray that would work for me I've used so many kinds and this is by far the best and you can get it on Amazon for half the price so but if you want to use something that you can shape or actually touch and that mess it up or if you want to make it into a helmet you can use that do that too is he a really hard to manage hair as I do I simply using my product this is by far the best I have found
customer_reviews.author: D.Anthony Chalupa

customer_reviews.title: Best.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this hairspray for over a decade. Nothing works like this. Don't have to touch my hair all day!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy D.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with the lid off and spray stem broken off. I’m sure it just got damaged, rolling in the box. There were 3 sections of puffy sealed air bags on top of it, but nothing to keep it from rolling side to side. Update: My review probably wasn’t fair, although the product wasn’t wrapped and shipped well, the hairspray isn’t a bad product. I’ve purchased this from my hair salon before and it works great. This was the first time I’ve ordered it from Amazon (much better price). Amazon did make it right...I’m supposed to receive a replacement tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Pam S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely fine hair and most hair spray type products end up feeling like glue on my hair. I absolutely love this product and have been using nothing else for over five years. My local supermarket seemed to always be out so was thrilled when I discovered it on Amazon, couple of dollars cheaper besides!
customer_reviews.author: P B Lee

customer_reviews.title: Liquid Super glue. THANK YOU!!
customer_reviews.text: So I have medium to fine hair. Recently due to certain medications my hair has thinned out some. This hair spray is amazing because if I tease my hair a bit and spray this hair spray over it and it lasts all day in the Florida humidity and heat !!! I was a big sexy hair hairspray fan until it started to cause flakes .. so I found this spray. Not only does it work better than BSH but it is very firrrrrm. Like liquid super glue in a fine mist. 💙💙💙
customer_reviews.author: Lopez

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS SPRAY
customer_reviews.text: If you want your hair not too move for the night, this is the spray for you!
customer_reviews.author: Reg202

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years. It is one of the few hairsprays that doesn't make my head itch and still have a great hold without being stiff. Far more expensive than drug store brands but so worth it as you don't need much to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: JanP

customer_reviews.title: Freezes Not so much...
customer_reviews.text: I have no body straight hair and this freezes my hair for about a half hour. Way too expensive for something that holds for an hour. Very disappointed. On a side note the can was taped to keep it safe in shipment. Great idea...Except the glue from the tape is still on the can and I literally have to shake it loose from my hand. Come to think of it the can holds to my hand better than the spray holds my hair!
customer_reviews.author: L Botsko

customer_reviews.title: Great Hairspray
customer_reviews.text: I am been using this hairspray for a long time and nothing else works as well on my hair which is very fine. Once your hair is styled and sprayed, it will stay for a long time. You can also brush through it if you need to and re-style. My order came in the time I expected, but one can had a broken spray nozzle. I guess this happened in shipping. I would recommend this spray to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Susie B. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: No more hair helmet
customer_reviews.text: Baboon is the best. It holds your hair very well without making you feel like you have a hair helmet. Is it expensive? Yes and no- you use a lot less to get the hold you need, so a can lasts longer. It has a fine mist instead of a blast like a lot of others.
customer_reviews.author: MamaD

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hairspray and I have used it for years. It’s amazing and does not build up on my hair. I will continue to use it as long as I have hair. The seller is great. No problems there. Also, the product was package well and arrived early. I’m very happy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bagshaw

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this it’s much more affordable than my hairdresser charges highly recommend this it’s great for styling without making your hair stiff like hairspray
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great Hair Spray
customer_reviews.text: Love this hair spray! I go through all different kinds and this one is one of the better ones! Not sticky and combs through. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Only hair spray that doesn't weight down my hair.
customer_reviews.text: Love this hair spray - and I've tried MANY. This is the only one I've found that doesn't weight down my hair... and holds it.
customer_reviews.author: Reg

customer_reviews.title: Firm flexible control
customer_reviews.text: I love this hairspray and can only get it from Amazon. It doesn’t build up on your hair and has a nice firm hold without turning you into a helmet head.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl T.

customer_reviews.title: Great sutff
customer_reviews.text: I love this spray, it holds great and smells wonderful. It IS a little expensive for the size, but i have to splurge a little on some things!
customer_reviews.author: Rena

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight hold, not sticky
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight hold. Not sticky. The best replacement I've found since Tigi changed the formula and smell of their Catwalk Work-It spray.
customer_reviews.author: Connie C.

customer_reviews.title: Hold and the look
customer_reviews.text: My hair is hard to hold. After reading all the reviews I thought that this would be worth trying. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: JOYCE GOFF

customer_reviews.title: No Can, No Working Nozzle, Leaked Product
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived today with no cap, a spray nozzle that wasn’t working properly, and product had leaked all over in the box (probably due to the fact that some bozo thought shipping it without a cap was a smart idea, and an okay thing to do). The product isn’t eligible for a return either, so even if the product works as well as some of the reviews say it does, you’ll be gambling with fate to get a can that actually works in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Label around cap is horrendous
customer_reviews.text: Can’t tell if products works because of this label on the cap! How do you remove this extremely tight label???
customer_reviews.author: atorp

customer_reviews.title: Not too thick and certainly not gummy
customer_reviews.text: A light spray is all I want. It doesn't make my hair gummy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Helen from Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for several years and have found it to be superior to many others. I can recommend and will purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: Best Hairspray Made
customer_reviews.text: Best styling and holding spray out there. I won’t use a anything else. Brushes out easily.

customer_reviews.title: Holds the hair in place!
customer_reviews.text: My elderly mother loves this product and luckily I was able to order from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Great  hold , highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Hold my very fine hair in place all day, even in hot and humid So. Fla. Just wish it had a nice scent.
customer_reviews.author: Paula M

customer_reviews.title: No Nozzles
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 cans of Vavoom Hairspray and they both had broken nozzles. These are about $14 each, which is a lot for hairspray. I feel like I just through my money away. Mary Angle

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice spray but only a medium strength hold.

customer_reviews.title: Better Bargain on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Great bargain. Over $2.00 cheaper than at the hair supply store.

customer_reviews.title: Best Hairspray on the Market
customer_reviews.text: Best hair spray for fine hair that doesn't like to keep a curl.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Used this since the 80s for the Big hair! Lol Still works great

customer_reviews.text: Have used this Product for many years and it still works great. Highly recommend it.

customer_reviews.text: This was not as good as the others from the brand don’t know much why

customer_reviews.title: Keeps hair in place without feeling like glue!
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this amazing product while shopping at a local Department Store. I was thrilled when I discovered it on Amazon, few dollars cheaper and free delivery! It's been 3 years that I have been using nothing else but this Fantastic product. I recommend it to everyone!

customer_reviews.text: This is the only spray I use as it is not sticky but holds A+++ on the fast service

customer_reviews.title: A little does the job

customer_reviews.title: Matrix freezing finishing hairspray
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, spray it on, if you dont like the style you can brush it right out.

customer_reviews.text: Excellent hold and brushes out easily. Hair does not feel too stiff.

customer_reviews.title: Holds Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this hair spray for quite a while and won't use anything else.

customer_reviews.title: Spray nozzle broken
customer_reviews.text: I purchased in may. I know return closed in june. However I just went to use hair spray, as i always keep extra can ,and the spray nozzle was off the can. Can't use it. Can i return for a new one. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Helen A.

customer_reviews.title: The best hairspray
customer_reviews.text: It's the best hairspray I ever used. I've been using it for few years now and it's great with my fine hair.

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging broke nozzle TWICE
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but poor packaging by amazon resulted in broken spray nozzle and unusable product TWICE. Guess you can’t order aerosol hairspray from Amazon.

customer_reviews.title: That it holds well
customer_reviews.text: I like this 0product to stay into my hand to hold down the ends of my hair and then to hold my hair style. It is very firm.

customer_reviews.title: Go to the store and buy

customer_reviews.title: Great product

customer_reviews.text: Even if you buy this one thinking its the old one they will just send you and updated version and its not as good.

customer_reviews.title: No lid in box
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping but came without a lid. Hard for me to pack for traveling without worrying about it getting all over my clothes.

customer_reviews.title: Bad Product

customer_reviews.text: the product is great - used for hair spray. The delivery was a few days late but was received today.

customer_reviews.text: I love this “finishing” hair spray. It holds well with a light spray, so your hair still looks natural.

customer_reviews.text: used this product a few times & nozzle quit working with at least 3/4 of the bottle left. not happy!

customer_reviews.title: Best hairspray ever....
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and larger than expected! Been using this hairspray forever ....it's awesome! Just the right amount of hold- not wet and very fast drying. Excellent price too. Fast delivery...will purchase again!!

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a spray that would provide a ...

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem as good as previous product that I had recently used.There was a can at work that someone had purchased and I liked

product_meta.title: MATRIX Vavoom Freezing Finishing Hairspray | Freezes Any Hair Style | Extra Firm Hold | For All Hair Types
product_meta.description:
Size:11 Ounce

Vavoom Freezing Finishing Hairspray is an extra-firm, fast-drying hairspray. This volumizing, texturizing professional salon product is a styling essential. The anti-frizz antidote, it freezes any hair style with a firm hold. A great hair primer for updos, braids and ponytails, and the perfect way to keep wavy hair and curly hair looking energized and frizz-free.

Key Benefits
Provides UV protection, 24-hour humidity resistance, 24-hour anti-frizz protection, and 24-hour bounce back hold even in 97% Humidity

Suitable for all hair lengths.





BRAND STORY
MATRIX is leading professional haircare and hair color brand worldwide. We aim to provide professional hairdressers and their clients with haircare and styling products that inspire creativity and deliver superior results.
